page.title: 08Housing and Trade , Helford
page.content: HOUSING There are several ancient farm houses and cottages 400 or 500 years old;many are no longer tied,and have been modernised with varying degrees of success.some bought for retirement or holiday homes.No council houses.Some new homes which are owner occupied or let. ECONOMICS despite the only shop comprising food and gifts,having the Post Office franchise,two successive young owners have been unable to make it pay. TRADE Helford boatyard, tearooms and chandlery cater for boat owners. Riverside Restaurant,(Egon Ronay top award winner),also has some guest rooms.Rose cottage tearooms.Landrivick cream teas and bed and breakfast.One wine wholesaler imports and distributes continental wines.
